title: Honoring Mary Lee upon the occasion of her designation for special recognition by the Town of Rochester Youth Commission
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Mary Lee upon the occasion of her desig-
nation for special recognition by the Town of Rochester Youth Commission

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Mary Lee has given not only of her time and energies but also
of her competence, intelligence and leadership and consequently has been
designated for special honor; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Mary Lee  upon
the  occasion  of her designation for special recognition by the Town of
Rochester Youth Commission; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Mary Lee  upon
the  occasion  of her designation for special recognition by the Town of
Rochester Youth Commission, to be celebrated  on  Friday,  February  11,
2011, at the Rochester Community Center; and
  WHEREAS,  Known  as one of the three founders of the Town of Rochester
Youth Commission, Mary Lee has served as its Chair for many years and as
a member, has given over 30 years of distinguished service to the organ-
ization; she has retired from the Commission and is  being  acknowledged
for her stellar service; and
  WHEREAS,  Currently a Treasurer for both the Rochester Reformed Church
and the Little Ones Learning Center, Mary Lee is also a former 4-H  Club
leader, Boy Scout volunteer, and a Little League supporter; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  her  career,  Mary  Lee has worked as a Physical
Education and Substitute Teacher, a Guidance Counselor and a high school
Librarian; and
  WHEREAS, A recipient of both the Community Partnership and  Friend  of
Extension  Awards,  Mary  Lee  was dedicated with the inaugural Mary Lee
Friend of Youth Award given in her honor by the Town of Rochester;  this
particular  award annually recognizes a Town of Rochester volunteer who,
like Mary Lee, shows an exceptional dedication  to  the  development  of
youth in the town; and
  WHEREAS,  Mary  Lee  has  been  called upon to contribute her time and
talents to countless civic and charitable endeavors and has always given
of herself unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period  of  her  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive  involvement,  Mary  Lee  has stood constant in
dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, With her throughout have been her husband Donald, their chil-
dren, Michael, John, Andrew and Deborah, as well as seven grandchildren,
all of whom feel privileged to be a part of her life and rejoice in  her
achievements; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by an individ-
ual  for  the  benefit of others which Mary Lee has displayed throughout
her life; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Mary Lee upon the occasion of her designation for special recogni-
tion by the Town of Rochester Youth Commission; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Mary Lee.
